# deferred

**Type Property**

The system brings the app to the foreground while it performs the intent’s action or just before returning from its perform function.

## Declaration

```swift
static var deferred: IntentModes.ForegroundMode { get }
```

## Discussion

When you choose the `.deferred` foreground mode, explicitly bring your app to the foreground as part of your [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppIntent/perform()] implementation or let the system bring it to the foreground before it returns the result of your `perform()` implementation.
title: deferred
